From: Linton Crockford-Moore <lintoncrockfordmoore@gmail.com <mailto:lintoncrockfordmoore@gmail.com> >
	Sent: Monday, July 7, 2025 7:23 PM
	To: Abbas, Angie <A.Abbas@hasenkamp.com <mailto:A.Abbas@hasenkamp.com> >; Ingie Chalhoub <Ingie.Chalhoub@etoilegroup.com <mailto:Ingie.Chalhoub@etoilegroup.com> >; Hiba Assaf <hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com <mailto:hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com> >

	Subject: Re: Installation Anish Kapoor in Dubai 
	 

	Dear Angie,

	 

	Thank you for our messages today regarding the transportation of the Anish Kapoor artwork within Dubai, from Jumeriah to the Palm, on Wednesday 9th July.

	 

	Once you know if this possible with your crew, please let me know for the planning.

	 

	Collection Address:

	                  To be sent

	 

	Delivery Address:

	Palm Jumeirah

	Frond J

	Villa J32 – 34

				Dear Pari,

				I understand you're based in Abu Dhabi—would you be available for a call at some point to discuss the installation process and relevant details? I’ve included my mobile number below for ease of coordination:

	In the meantime, for the collection the access is simple enough.  For the delivery on the Palm, we would be required to apply for access passes with Nakheal.

	- ⁠Driver EID

	2.         Type of truck that will be used for transporting the items to the site.

	Once we receive the above information, we will initiate the NOC process, after which the document will need to be uploaded to the Nakheel website for Gatepass approval.
